overview:
Currently Sean is the Vice President of Operations at Slingshot Labs. Slingshot Labs, a division of News Corporation, is a web incubator dedicated to building new Internet companies.

Sean is a co-founder and chief executive officer of RealtyTracker; an online real estate lead generation service which serviced over 15,000 real estate agents nationwide. In March of 2007, RealtyTracker was acquired by Guthy-Renker. Sean also served as Vice President of Operations of Xdrive Technologies.

Sean has a M.B.A from the University Of Southern Californiaâ€™s Marshall School of Business, as well as a B.A. in Business Economics from the University of California, Santa Cruz.
